name: Cooking Day Restaurant Game
description:
The game is filled with amazing challenges and fast pace time management. Cook & serve hungry customers in many fancy restaurants! Get ready to become the best cooking chef in every kitchen that this game has to offer! Give yourself real kitchen cooking challenge of crazy kitchen cooking game. Take orders of customers and quickly start making best dishes in given time.

You’ll be feeling like a dashing restaurant manager! Not to mention the special kitchenware that makes you the greatest chef in this food games.

Features

- Exciting Cooking game with many restaurants
- Best Food serving & Restaurant serving games 2018
- Many Challenging levels to play
- Earn Keys to unlock new amazing cooking world
-Utilize coins to upgrade your kitchen items
-Amazing HD graphics and sound effects
-Real time Cooking Experience
